attributes.action: Hold a referendum for the legalisation of cannabis and medical cannabis
attributes.additional_details: So why is it that you want to stop people from smoking something that helps. i have h.s hidredentis superativa  look it up  its painful i also suffer with anxiety and depression and adhd   and i   god for bid i get arrested for this smoke cannabis illegal and do so knowingly to enhance my health and make me feel more at one with my self it makes me feel able again i struggle to walk or socialise with out this medicine so please for thousands like me and for those who are worse off  help us help each other we only have1🌎
attributes.background: Since long before my time cannabis has been prepetuated as a bad drug  by goverment officials and big pharmaceutical companys when in fact our own goverment grows and distributes cannabis all over.  It is on this alone that tells me goverment officials do beleive cannabis has medicinal  purposes
